page.title: 12SCHOOL
page.content: {School staff. { ______________} { Head teacher:Mr Scarborough. { P5-7 teacher:Mr Scarborough. { P1-4 teacher:Miss Burrnet. { Cooks:Mrs Watt & Mrs Duncan. { Cleaner:Mrs Gray. { Secratary:Mrs Duncan. { Mini-bus driver:Mrs Smith. { }The school is small and has three classrooms.We also have a hall which is used for dinner and for gym.We have two teachers. We read our books in the morning and then do our maths.After that we go out for break then come back in Then carry on with our maths if we're not finished.We do our language then by the time we are finished the bell goes we go for our dinner.We work in the afternoon and go home at 3.30pm.
